core.pedobear

Class PedoConsoleLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.pedobear.PedoConsoleLogger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPedoLogger

    public class PedoConsoleLogger
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPedoLogger
    This logger does nothing but write messages to the console.
    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    Jasper S.

        public PedoConsoleLogger(int logLevel)
